info.name: Management API
info.description:
If you have UI/UX requirements specific to your business/application domain, you can build a custom campaign manager application on top of Molocoâ€™s Management API. The management API allows you to perform ad campaign-related operations such as creating/updating ad campaigns and pulling report data.

You need to set below environment variables to use this collection

- `mgmt_url` : Moloco's staff will provide accurate host information.
    
- `mgmt_api_key` : Please review the [API Key ](https://mcm-docs.moloco.com/docs/api-and-sso-credential-management) guide for information on generating an API key
    
- `platform_id` : Moloco's staff will provide platform_id information.
    

API reference: [https://mcm-docs.moloco.com/reference/rmpmanagementapi_listadaccounts](https://mcm-docs.moloco.com/reference/rmpmanagementapi_listadaccounts)

const timestamp = new Date().toISOString().replace(/[-:.TZ]/g, ""); // Generate timestamp (YYYYMMDDHHMMSS)
